Rioto

Height:
6'2" (186 cm)
Group (2024-present):
ARrC

Introduction

Rioto is a Japanese dancer and singer under MYSTIC Story. He is the main dancer of the boy group ARrC.

On July 8, 2024, MYSTIC Story introduced their first boy group, ARrC. Rioto was unveiled as one of the seven members of this group.
